Title: Relates to professional obligations under the physician loan repayment program
Summary: Relates to professional obligations under the physician loan repayment program; provides an option to practice as a physician engaged in private practice in an underserved area.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-m, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to professional obligations under the physician loan repayment program
